context: Cata & Dani are in Brașov (Coresi) until April 1. Moving to Vienna for 1-2 months to get Daniela's US visa sorted (she's Colombian with Austrian residence). Then Colombia to visit her family. Food is a huge daily struggle — bad quality in the area, never know what to eat. Jan 31 evening: wine mode gaming chat. Cata feels bored after Elden Ring, everything feels like brain rot. Feb 1: Sunday. Fridge almost empty, need weekly shopping. Provided full shopping list + meal rotation at 10:58 UTC, waiting for feedback. They were heading to gym.

gaming: liked Elden Ring (ruined other games for him)
wants good graphics, not pixel art
values systems-driven games over scripted content
